sentences.english: When back at home, he likes to play video games and adores teddy bears.
sentences.chinese: 在家裏，他愛打遊戲機，喜歡‘泰迪熊’。

sentences.english: Creative bedding set inspired by the iconic video game console.
sentences.chinese: 受到標誌性的視頻遊戲機所啓發的創意牀上用品。

sentences.english: The test consisted of back to back rides the same trails using both forks.
sentences.chinese: 測試構成背對背遊戲機相同的路徑，使用叉子。

sentences.english: Alan, Is that your computer game in the lost and found case?
sentences.chinese: 在失物招領箱裏的那是你的電子遊戲機嗎？

sentences.english: He played baseball and basketball and Nintendo instead.
sentences.chinese: 他寧願每天玩玩棒球，籃球和遊戲機。

sentences.english: The first thing in order is of course a big congrats to the console.
sentences.chinese: 第一件要做的事自然是給ps遊戲機一個大大的祝賀。

sentences.english: But behind that screen is a much-improved gaming machine.
sentences.chinese: 在屏幕之後，卻是改進不少的遊戲機。

sentences.english: The other is an enthusiast class gaming machine.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面是發燒級遊戲機。

sentences.english: Playing computer games squanders parents' hard-earned cash.
sentences.chinese: 打遊戲機浪費父母的血汗錢。

sentences.english: If I want video games, I have a console hooked up to my TV.
sentences.chinese: 如果我想玩視頻遊戲，我有一臺連接到電視的遊戲機。

sentences.english: I save some egg money for the newest-PSP.
sentences.chinese: 我想買最新的遊戲機，所以存了點私房錢。

sentences.english: Still , you cant swim in the kiddy pool .
sentences.chinese: 還有，你不能在游泳池遊戲機。

sentences.english: But don't throw out the Wii or the flatscreen just yet.
sentences.chinese: 但是也不要只是簡單地把遊戲機或顯示器扔到一邊。

sentences.english: Japan has more than 5.5 million vending machines, note validators and game-playing machines.
sentences.chinese: 日本有550萬臺自動售貨機，驗鈔機和遊戲機。

sentences.english: Keep the video game player put up until they show you their completed homework.
sentences.chinese: 把遊戲機收起來直到他們徹底的完成了任務。

definition: tablet computer (iPad, Android devices etc)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
to sell directly/direct sale (by a factory)/direct marketing
